column4: ...and btw, cpu trottle is above 13% all the time ... I have nothing running that justify that load!
umm I have X w/compiz, a music player, a browser, and irc running, and sit at about 15% all the time.  13% means you maybe don't have a music player running...
mmm normally , when idle cpu should be between 0%-2%
how do you figure?  X itself is 8-10%
